alert.note: Alert for Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 1:39PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pembina County through 230 PM CDT... At 139 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Leroy, or 33 miles east of Langdon, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cavalier, Walhalla, Neche, Mountain, Hensel, Hamilton and Bathgate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
